name: Rime Worm Grub
description: The Rime Worm Grub is a medium-sized elemental marked by its affinity for cold environments, with a tough natural armor and notable camouflage in snowy terrain. It has a burrowing form and can engage in effective melee attacks with a striking tendril.
memorable: It has the ability to ambush foes, deal additional damage to weak targets, and burrow through snow effortlessly.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting creatures and survive in cold climates.
relations: Could be found with other cold elementals or in frigid environments.
environment: Typically found in snowy terrains and cold environments.
strengths: Resistant to cold damage, proficient in stealth, and capable of ambushing and attacking weakened foes.
weaknesses: Low intelligence, wisdom, and charisma make it inept in non-combat interactions.
attacks: Rime Tendril delivers both bludgeoning and cold damage, effective particularly against weakened creatures within reach.
most_powerful_ability: Ravenous Larva allows it to attack anyone leaving its reach and grants advantage against injured foes.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet for enhanced hunting in the dark.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, enhancing its ability to hide in snowy terrains.
additional_information: Can breathe air and water due to its amphibious nature.
Burrows through nonmagical snow, ice, and difficult terrain without penalty.
Has advantage on Stealth checks made in snowy environments.
test_queries: cold elemental creature with burrowing ability
rime worm grub attacks with cold damage
medium-sized creature found in icy terrain
elemental that thrives in cold environments
